chapter.title: OpenStack Training Guides are under Construction

section.title: What under construction means
section.para: We need your help! This is a community driven project to reuse as much of the existing documentation as possible. We cannot make this work without your help. There is an easy way to contribute to this effort. Look at the end of end section and you will see the Submit a Bug link. When you find something that can be improved or fixed, submit a bug!
Look below for more details on the OpenStack Training project.
